features: NATURAL & EFFECTIVE: A natural formula made without harsh chemicals, our conditioner is gentle & effective for daily use. Our formula removes buildup and excess oil that can clog your pores & inhibit growth, all while soothing scalp inflammation.

THICKENING FORMULA: Our conditioner features a specialized thickening formula with Swertia Japonica & Clove Flower that penetrates deep into the scalp to add volume & thickness to thinning hair, providing fuller & healthier-looking hair.

JAPANESE ROOTED: Blackwood For Men's conditioner features natural Botanical Boosts from Japan, like Tsubaki & Licorice Root to balance excess oil, nourish the scalp & promote healthy hair growth. Leave your locks looking fuller & more voluminous!

DANDRUFF CONTROL: Say goodbye to pesky flakes and an itchy scalp with our expertly crafted men's conditioner. Formulated with a blend of natural ingredients and hydrating agents, our conditioner supports relief and protection against scalp irritation

FULL PROTECTION: Our conditioner is specially formulated with a powerful blend of antioxidants, including Vitamin C and Arginine, to safeguard your hair against breakage, color loss, and damage caused by free radicals, pollutants, and UV rays.

Pumped Up Swag Form + Function We highlight Japanese principles of shibui & miyabi (simplicty & elegance) in sleek bottles. Level Up for Less Premium Quality Without Premium Cost Cleaner, classier natural formulas at a better value so more guys get access to healthier grooming. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Daily Ritual for Strong, Invigorated Hair!
reviews.reviewText: Blackwood for Men has nailed it with their Active Man Daily Conditioner. From its refreshing scent to the nourishing formula, this conditioner elevates my hair care routine. It leaves my hair soft, manageable, and ready to conquer the day. For a grooming essential that goes above and beyond, Blackwood earns a solid five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband uses this daily
reviews.reviewText: So, my husband loves this conditioner! He uses it daily!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The reason for four stars is because I broke the pump the first time I tried to use it, so it may be a weird pump or I just had a moment of ineptitude but either way, using it for the last month with a broken pump has been a little annoying but it still works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great, made my middle of back length hair comb easier, great scent!
reviews.reviewText: All around I have liked using this product. This conditioner made my hair comb through easier for sure, and gave me confidence that it is a quality product. I thought it smelled good too contrary to another review. Not sure on the long term effects yet it will have on my hair (only using it for a week) or if I will re-order given the price point, but so far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Conditioner with some added benefits.
reviews.reviewText: This is an absolute game-changer. I feel more confident without having to walk around with an itchy irritated scalp with dandruff. I also feel my hair is more silky and healthy. Nothing short of what I plan on using for the rest of my life. If you're looking for a conditioner, this is the one. Also, feel my hair is more full after using this...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good conditioner (5 stars), horrible pump top (0 stars)--not sure I will buy again.
reviews.reviewText: I have continued to buy this for my son b/c I love the natural ingredients, smell and it works great for his curly dry hair. So the actual product I'd give 5 stars and O stars for pump. They need to design a new pump top. It is VERY hard to open and sometimes doesn't. You are supposed to screw base of pump on tight to bottle, then turn the pump top counter clockwise. It's only worked 50 percent of time on purchases. So you have to pull the whole pump out when you want to use it. There's no instruction on bottle on how to open it. So you have to go to amazon site and look up product and watch video on how to open. Really hope they design new top and advertise that. Otherwise, I think we're done. Too frustrating to open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Great! Hair never felt the same.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I used a conditioner that doesn't leave my hair frizzled after drying off, also feels smooth and non-elastic. The smell of it is amazing. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good conditioner, not ideal for wavy/curly hair
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, and works pretty good, but not ideal for wavy/curly hair
